TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmRelationshipAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class EdmRelationshipAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class EdmRelationshipAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 根據概念模型中的關聯，定義兩個實體 (Entity) 類型之間的關聯性 (Relationship)。

span.span: Defines a relationship between two entity types based on an association in the conceptual model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會在組件 (Assembly) 層級套用，而且每個關聯都有一個執行個體 (Instance)。This attribute is applied at the assembly level with one instance for each association. 一個組件可能會有多個屬於這個類型的屬性。There can be multiple attributes of this type in an assembly. 特定關聯中實體類型之角色的詳細資料應該與在概念結構描述中定義的關聯相符。The details for the role of an entity type in a particular association should match the association defined in the conceptual schema. 關聯不會針對角色來定義任何排序。An association does not define any ordering for the roles. 這表示，定義關聯之相關端的屬性可依任何順序定義。This means that properties that define the related ends of an association can be defined in any order.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `typeof`運算子 (`GetType`在 Visual Basic 中) 用來傳回物件的物件。The `typeof` operator (`GetType` in Visual Basic) is used to return the object for an object.

MemberSignature.Value: public string RelationshipName { get; }

Public ReadOnly Property RelationshipName As String

span.span: Name of the relationship.

value.span: ，它是這個 所定義之關聯性的名稱。

span.span: A that is the name of a relationship that is defined by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 關聯性的名稱由指定`Name`屬性`Association`概念模型中定義此關聯性的項目。The name of the relationship is specified by the `Name` attribute of the `Association` element that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[CSDL、 SSDL 和 MSL 規格](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md)。For more information, see [CSDL, SSDL, and MSL Specifications](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md).

.property instance string RelationshipNamespaceName
Public ReadOnly Property RelationshipNamespaceName As String
public: property System::String ^ RelationshipNamespaceName { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: The namespace for the relationship.
A that is the namespace for the relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所指定關聯性的命名空間`Namespace`屬性`Schema`項目，其中包含概念模型中定義此關聯性的關聯。The namespace of the relationship is specified by the `Namespace` attribute of the `Schema` element that contains association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[CSDL、 SSDL 和 MSL 規格](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md)。For more information, see [CSDL, SSDL, and MSL Specifications](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md).

Public ReadOnly Property Role1Multiplicity As RelationshipMultiplicity
public: property System::Data::Metadata::Edm::RelationshipMultiplicity Role1Multiplicity { System::Data::Metadata::Edm::RelationshipMultiplicity get(); };

summary.span: 位於關聯性某一端的多重性。

span.span: Multiplicity at one end of the relationship.
A value that indicates the multiplicity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義關聯之相關端的屬性可依任何順序定義。Properties that define the related ends of an association can be defined in any order. 所指定多重性`Multiplicity`屬性`End`概念模型中定義此關聯性的關聯中的項目。The multiplicity is specified by the `Multiplicity` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[CSDL、 SSDL 和 MSL 規格](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md)。For more information, see [CSDL, SSDL, and MSL Specifications](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 角色名稱由指定`Role`屬性`End`概念模型中定義此關聯性的關聯中的項目。The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[CSDL、 SSDL 和 MSL 規格](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md)。For more information, see [CSDL, SSDL, and MSL Specifications](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md).
